subject: Re: different results between swingui and textui runner
msgSnippet: ... If it were me, I would load the jUnit source in my IDE (eclipse), and debug into it to find where and why the NPE is occurring. Others on this list might
messageBody:
"mjz115" <mikezawacki@...> wrote:
> I've written a simple test case that successfully runs using the
> textui test runner. When I attempt to run the same exact test using
> the swingui or awtui test runner, I get a NullPointerException. Can
> anyone explain what might be different about the jvm, classloader, or
> environment when using the swingui.TestRunner? Unfortunately, my class
> is not the one spewing out the exception so I can't use source code to
> see what's going on.

If it were me, I would load the jUnit source in my IDE (eclipse), and
debug into it to find where and why the NPE is occurring.

Others on this list might be able to offer paths of less resistance,
especially if you are not familiar with debugging in an IDE.

Good Luck,
Chad
